thread.title: Sony Xperia M5 smartphone launched at Rs 37,990 price
thread.title_full: Sony Xperia M5 smartphone launched at Rs 37,990 price | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Sony Xperia M5 smartphone launched at Rs 37,990 price
text:
Other Articles No shoppers’ stop: Crisil Trai offers 15-day deadline for telcos to minimise call drops L&T not in hurry to fill top post, says AM Naik Sony on Wednesday launched its Xperia M5 dual-SIM smartphone in India at a price of Rs 37,990.
The water-proof Xperia M5 sports a 21.5 megapixel camera that can capture videos in 4K resolution (4096 x 2160). It has a 13 megapixel front camera which also comes with integrated autofocus and full high-definition video recording.
Sony Xperia M5 Dual comes with a 5-inch full HD display with Mobile Bravia Engine 2.
Xperia M5 integrates a large 2,600mAh battery offering up to two-days battery life. The device also has 64-bit 2.0 GHz Octa-core processor powered by MediaTekHelio X10 with 3GB RAM
Xperia M5 also has an expandable memory with up to 200GBuSD card and the device is available in the Dual SIM variant in India. Xperia M5 will be available in black and gold colour at Sony Centers, Sony Smartphone Lounges and all leading retail outlets across India.
First Published on September 09, 2015 5:11 pm © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
